extension.name: Favourite
extension.author: FavThemes
extension.description:
Favourite is a free responsive Joomla! template with 200+ settings for an easy and fast customization, using Bootstrap 3, HTML5, CSS3, Google Fonts and Font Awesome. Design amazing responsive websites with this smart template that adapts and resizes itself to desktop and mobile devices, making your website looking great for everyone!

This free template can be used on unlimited personal or commercial websites, just don't resell it! Once you ordered and downloaded the template from our store, you have free and unlimited access to all future Joomla! versions of the product.

Demo Documentation



Copyright © 2012-2017 FavThemes.

field.name: offline_page_bg_image_style
field.default: no-repeat; background-attachment: fixed; -webkit-background-size: cover; -moz-background-size: cover; -o-background-size: cover; background-size: cover;
field.label: TPL_FAV_OFFLINE_PAGE_BG_IMAGE_STYLE_LABEL

option.value: repeat; background-attachment: initial; -webkit-background-size: auto; -moz-background-size: auto; -o-background-size: auto; background-size: auto;
repeat-x; background-attachment: initial; -webkit-background-size: auto; -moz-background-size: auto; -o-background-size: auto; background-size: auto;
no-repeat; background-attachment: fixed; -webkit-background-size: cover; -moz-background-size: cover; -o-background-size: cover; background-size: cover;
